message: Let's split it 60-40, a fair start!
I'll take the majority, but I'll give you a small share
Not good enough, I want a bigger share!
I'll give you a bigger share, but I need something substantial!
I'll give you a small consolation prize, but I'm taking the majority
I'll take a small share, but I'm hoping for a better deal later
I'm getting greedy, you're getting scraps
Not enough, I'm not going down without a fight!
I'm making a last-ditch effort, take it or leave it!
I'm not budging, you're running out of options
Fine, I'll take it, but this isn't over yet!
